mapper.select: SELECT m.menu_idx, m.menu_name_kor, SUM(r.menu_sales) AS total_sales FROM menu_reco r JOIN menu m ON r.menu_idx = m.menu_idx GROUP BY m.menu_idx, m.menu_name_kor ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 10
